text: 14.19: VB 19.15Ana ne nzuaim, mba enser won kos ndigap, ŋgiav, vergap mbu nuianan wain vhɨgi gorav, nta ndi phoga vhui. Ana nta ndi phoga vhov, nta fov, mba wain vhɨgi thiphogap, nta nduui kɨman muuŋgi teŋk bakɨme vhee sui. Mbe nta thiphogɨp, nta numɨn zav, maaŋ nta mbui. Mba tɨv, mbe guigira Fhe Bakɨmen ndav shirɨ panpana vhui tɨv ma.
